fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit someone tonight and redirect them to yourself. You may not visit the same person more than once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you're attacked, you aren't affected and your Defense tier increases by 1. (Maximum is Invincible)
- When you're healed or protected by a protective ability, you aren't affected and your Defense tier decreases by 1. If you go below "None", you die. Lynching is counted as a protective ability...For some reason.
- Redirection Immune
